configuration.comment: For XHR architecture for Java implementation

object.name: blackberry.app
object.comment: The Application object provides functions and properties for the currently running application.
object.example:
<script type="text/javascript">

  function newData(isNewData)
  {
      if (isNewData && !blackberry.app.isForeground)
      {
         // Notify our user via text on the homescreen
         blackberry.app.setHomeScreenName("New data");
      }
      else
        alert("New data has arrived");
  }

</script>
